title: Calculate Minimum Value in an Array
description: This function computes the minimum value in an array of real numbers. The function takes a pointer to an array and its size as input parameters, iterates through the array elements, and identifies the smallest value present.
name: ARRAY_MIN

input.name: pt
input.description: Pointer to the array of real numbers from which the minimum value will be computed.

input.name: size
input.description: The size of the array indicating the number of elements to be considered for the minimum calculation.

output.name: array_min
output.description: The minimum value found in the specified array of real numbers.

return_value.description: Returns the minimum value found within the input array.
